mapper.select: SELECT privilege.`privilegeID`,privilege.`privilegeName` FROM ptmanagement,privilege WHERE privilegeTypeID = #{privilegetypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ptmanagement.`privilegeID`=privilege.`privilegeID`
mapper.insert:
insert into ptmanagement
ptID,
privilegeTypeID,
privilegeID,
#{ptid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{privilegetypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{privilegeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update ptmanagement
privilegeTypeID = #{privilegetypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
privilegeID = #{privilegeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ptID = #{ptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
